Class ConcurrentWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.ConcurrentWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ConcurrentWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Used for implementing within a thread to write a single order to the order output file.
    Author:
    pig
    See Also:
    Order, Runnable, MyValidationException
